items.sentence: Tom didn't have the decency to admit it was his fault.
Tom didn't get paid as much as he expected to be paid.
Tom doubted that Mary was as rich as she said she was.
Tom's room was a lot smaller than I expected it to be.
Tom used to play the trombone. Now he plays the cello.
This is where I stayed the last time I came to Boston.
Are you sure that we're talking about the same person?
You are saying you intentionally hide your good looks?
Tom expects Mary to arrive in Boston Monday afternoon.
I knew all along that Tom wouldn't be able to do that.
